lyric:
[00:00.000] 作词 : Tayla Parx/Robin Oliver Frid/Morten Ristorp/Brian A. Garcia/Uzoechi Emenike
[00:00.001] 作曲 : Tayla Parx/Robin Oliver Frid/Morten Ristorp/Brian A. Garcia/Uzoechi Emenike
[00:00.003] Doo-doo, doo-doo-doo-doo
[00:01.309] Doo-roo-doo-doo, doo-roo-doo-roo
[00:03.436] Doo-doo, doo-doo-doo-doo
[00:05.387] Doo-roo-doo-doo, doo-doo-doo-doo
[00:06.875]
[00:06.983] In a whole 'nother life, there was this boy that I knew
[00:11.090] He made me feel like a woman
[00:13.210] We were young and silly fools
[00:14.922] Anyway, he was in a band
[00:17.121] Wrote love songs about me
[00:19.068] I wasn't crazy 'bout the words, but the melodies were sweet
[00:22.756] Went something like
[00:23.429]
[00:23.437] Doo-doo, doo-doo-doo-doo
[00:25.288] Doo-roo-doo-doo, doo-roo-doo-roo
[00:27.545] Doo-doo, doo-doo-doo-doo
[00:29.378] Doo-roo-doo-doo, doo-doo-doo-doo
[00:31.203]
[00:31.226] Every time we go dancing, I see his straying eyes
[00:35.132] Gave him too many chances, push my gears too many times
[00:39.000] Anyway, he start acting dumb, then I'll be on my way to leave
[00:43.076] But I stopped in the tracks when I heard this melody
[00:46.929] And it went like
[00:47.364]
[00:47.397] Doo-doo, doo-doo-doo-doo
[00:49.350] Doo-roo-doo-doo, doo-roo-doo-roo
[00:51.562] Doo-doo, doo-doo-doo-doo
[00:53.446] Doo-roo-doo-doo, doo-doo-doo-doo
[00:54.593]
[00:54.929] He used to sing me sweet melodies
[00:59.244] He played me, made me believe it was real love
[01:03.678] Sang me sweet melodies
[01:06.335] But the day he did me wrong
[01:08.403] The song couldn't go on and on and on
[01:10.941] He used to sing me sweet melodies
[01:15.168] He played me, made me believe it was real love
[01:19.663] Sang me sweet melodies
[01:22.255] But the day he did me wrong
[01:24.477] The song couldn't go on and on and on
[01:26.698]
[01:26.896] He would lie, he would cheat, over syncopated beats
[01:31.157] I was just his tiny dancer, he had control of my feet
[01:35.098] That's when he came along, that's when I lost the groove
[01:38.945] There was no song in the world
[01:40.897] To sing along or make me move
[01:42.962] Sounded something like
[01:43.532]
[01:43.557] Doo-doo, doo-doo-doo-doo
[01:45.231] Doo-roo-doo-doo, doo-roo-doo-roo (It was)
[01:47.715] Doo-doo, doo-doo-doo-doo
[01:49.415] Doo-roo-doo-doo, doo-doo-doo-doo (Oh)
[01:50.650]
[01:50.888] He used to sing me sweet melodies (Oh-woah)
[01:55.279] He played me, made me believe it was real love
[01:59.530] Sang me sweet melodies
[02:02.407] But the day he did me wrong (Ah, yeah)
[02:04.487] The song couldn't go on and on and on (Couldn't go on, no)
[02:06.919] He used to sing me sweet melodies (Sing sweet melodies)
[02:11.283] He played me, made me believe it was real love
[02:15.642] Sang me sweet melodies
[02:18.465] But the day he did me wrong (Me wrong)
[02:20.345] The song couldn't go on and on and on
[02:23.358]
[02:23.652] Doo-doo, doo-doo-doo-doo
[02:25.507] Doo-roo-doo-doo, doo-roo-doo-roo (Oh)
[02:27.572] Doo-doo, doo-doo-doo-doo
[02:29.540] Doo-roo-doo-doo, doo-roo-doo-roo (Oh, woah)
[02:30.910]
[02:31.185] On and on, on and on
[02:38.838] He used to sing me sweet melodies
[02:43.307] He played me, made me believe it was real love
[02:47.490] Sing me sweet melodies
[02:50.633] But the day he did me wrong (Me wrong)
[02:52.571] The song couldn't go on and on and on
[02:55.803] On and on, and on, yeah
[02:56.800]
[02:56.813] He used to sing me sweet melodies (Melodies, yeah)
[03:01.205] He played me, made me believe it was real love
[03:05.540] Sang me sweet melodies, oh-oh
[03:08.286] But the day he did me wrong (Did me wrong)
[03:10.414] The song couldn't go on and on and on
[03:13.450] He used to sing me sweet melodies (Sing me sweet melodies, yeah)
[03:17.342] He played me, made me believe it was real love (Oh, oh)
[03:21.519] Sang me sweet melodies (Oh)
[03:24.403] But the day he did me wrong (Eh)
[03:26.513] The song couldn't go on and on and on, no
tlyric:
[by:MelanieMartinezCollection]
[00:00.003]
[00:01.309]
[00:03.436]
[00:05.387]
[00:06.983]在平行时空的另一段人生 我熟识的那个男孩
[00:11.090]让我感觉像一位真正的女性
[00:13.210]年少轻狂 头脑发热
[00:14.922]他处在那乐队之中
[00:17.121]为我谱写情歌
[00:19.068]我并未被那歌词打动 但那段旋律无比甜蜜
[00:22.756]那旋律如同
[00:23.437]
[00:25.288]
[00:27.545]
[00:29.378]
[00:31.226]每一次我们共舞 我看见他迷离的眼神
[00:35.132]给予了他太多机会 无数次让自己成为主动的那个
[00:39.000]但他开始装聋作哑 我们只能渐行渐远
[00:43.076]但当我听到这段旋律 我再次停驻脚步
[00:46.929]那旋律如同
[00:47.397]
[00:49.350]
[00:51.562]
[00:53.446]
[00:54.929]他曾为我哼唱起甜蜜的旋律
[00:59.244]但他玩弄了我 让我误认为那是真爱
[01:03.678]为我哼唱甜蜜的旋律
[01:06.335]自他作出了错误的选择那一日
[01:08.403]这首歌便无法再唱下去
[01:10.941]他曾为我哼唱起甜蜜的旋律
[01:15.168]但他玩弄了我 让我误认为那是真爱
[01:19.663]为我哼唱甜蜜的旋律
[01:22.255]自他作出了错误的选择那一日
[01:24.477]这首歌便无法再唱下去
[01:26.896]他会在切分音乐里对我撒谎
[01:31.157]我只不过是他小小的舞伴 被他玩弄于股掌间
[01:35.098]当他走近之时 我迷失在节奏里
[01:38.945]世间没有一首歌
[01:40.897]能让我附和或随之舞动
[01:42.962]那旋律如同
